prompts: Create a small, green Pokemon with leaf-like features and a cute expression.
Show me a Grass-type Pokemon that thrives in forest environments and has a round shape.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a flower bud with playful red eyes and vibrant green accents.
Imagine a tiny Pokemon with a soft, fluffy appearance, perfect for sunny meadows.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature, with shades of green and a calm demeanor.
Give me a detailed description of a Pokemon that is often found in wetlands and has a gentle personality.
Make a unique Pokemon that evolves from a small plant into a larger, more powerful creature.
